author: abdoulline
body:
More complete set of HCAL consumes changes than in pull request #907.
NB: SimGeneral/DataMixinModule/plugins is affected in part related to HCAL consumes change, while other getByLabel's in it left untouched.  
Test 'runTheMatrix.py -s --useInput all' is OK.
title: Consumes update hcal
